abstract: HSBC’s chief executive, Michael Geoghegan, should stay in his post and spurn any offer to become chairman, according to banking analysts.

lead_paragraph: The HSBC chief executive, Michael Geoghegan, should stay in his post and spurn any offer to become chairman, according to banking analysts, Bloomberg News reports.

headline.main: Analysts Tell HSBC Chief to Reject Chairman Post
